about_the_game:
Koi Unleashed is an action RPG with party based combat, played with an isometric view.

Join a group of adventurers after their ship stranded in an unknown world where coloured carp fishes (Koi) are revered, mysterious creatures rule and the legend of an unsettled Dragon causes constant dismay.




    ​​
  • Character Customization: Play as up to six different heroes, each with their own unique set of abilities and specific roles (Tank, Healer, Damage dealer).
  • Party-based combat: Fight along with a party of up to 4 characters and command them to victory! Combat plays in real time but you set your own pace with the dynamic pause system: Auto-Pause when not moving/attacking or Manual Pause.
  • Boss fights: "Boss Rush" type of game where you fight powerful enemies, with different phases, where each phase feels unique and complex fights require tactics.
  • Character development: Character progression allows you to upgrade your and guild's stats with special items. Develop the talents tree of each class and your Guild, enhancing your spells and attacks.
  • Guild management: Experience the dynamics of a party. Guild interactions and party lineups play a big part on the gameplay experience and will have a direct impact on combat.



  • Cultured lore: Experience an epic story inspired by folklore of feudal Japan age.
  • Dynamic controls: Whether you like to play on your PC, on the couch or laptop the game will allow you to choose the controls you feel more comfortable with:
      ​​Full Controller support | Keyboard and mouse | Keyboard only with "WASD" movement
  • New Game+: Experience a higher difficulty setting where your Guild gets to keep the experience and items gained from a previous adventure.
  • Solo mode: Not a fan of parties? Try the same level of difficulty but by fighting alone like in a traditional ARPG.
